data.event: The village is largely dispersed with a mid-2005 population estimate for the parish of 230, measured at 257 in the 2011 Census.
Both are now closed and the major centre of population in the parish is to the west where it borders Ringsfield Corner.

event.title: was combined with that of All Saints Church, Ellough in the 1970s

data.event: The parish was combined with that of All Saints Church, Ellough in the 1970s.
